title: The Cowan Foundation supports new centre for medical sciences and biotechnology at Conestoga
autoMessage: Conestoga is announcing a transformative gift from The Cowan Foundation to help advance health care with accessible, high-quality programming.

title: Magna Centre for Industrial Skilled Trades established at Conestoga
autoMessage: A leadership gift from Magna International will support innovative and inclusive trades training programs at Conestoga to fuel the talent
